venue.name: Cambridge Innovation Center (CIC) - 5th Floor - Havana Room

item.description:
Come mix and mingle with fellow entrepreneurs! Find serendipitous connections, meet VCs for office hours and attend E&I-focused events. www.vencaf.com

Venture Cafe alpha is an invitational prototype, with invitations extended to the entrepreneurial, innovative and creative communities around Greater Boston. Cafe-goers are expected to participate in a manner consistent with the cafe's Credo. http://www.venturecafe.net/credo/credo

Â 

This event happens every Thursday from 3pm to 8pm.
item.name: Venture Cafe
